title.rendered: Health camp conducted for underprivileged children of Mission Education centre

content.rendered:
A health camp was conducted at a Mission education center at Mumbai. The main aim of conducting health camps in schools is to ensure that the children do not fall sick at regular intervals and remain healthy. Healthy students can maintain proper attendance in school and can be better and fast learners.. Doctor did a full body checkup of all the students who were present there and diagnosed their respective problems.

Mission Education is a national level programme of Smile Foundation, which is committed to providing basic education and healthcare to underprivileged children.

Smile Foundation is a national level development organisation directly benefitting over 400,000 children and their families every year, through more than 200 live welfare projects on education, healthcare, livelihood and women empowerment, in over 950 remote villages and slums across 25 states of India.
